meanings.definition: Lively or energetic behavior or attitude.
meanings.sent1: Her spiritedness during the dance performance was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The team's spiritedness on the field inspired the fans.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's spiritedness while chasing its tail was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The spiritedness of the river as it rushed over the rocks was invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The spiritedness of the children playing in the park brought joy to all who watched.

meanings.definition: The quality of being full of courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: His spiritedness in facing challenges was admirable.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's spiritedness in battle earned him respect from his comrades.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed great spiritedness in trying to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The spiritedness of the marathon runner as he crossed the finish line was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The spiritedness of the explorer in the face of danger was truly remarkable.
